channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by CBOS, 6–13 June 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Prawo i Sprawiedliwość (ECR): 28–33 seats
  • Platforma Obywatelska (EPP): 13–17 seats
  • Kukiz’15 (NI): 0–3 seats
  • .Nowoczesna (RE): 0 seats
  • Polskie Stronnictwo Ludowe (EPP): 0 seats
  • Sojusz Lewicy Demokratycznej (S&D): 0 seats
  • Wiosna (S&D): 4–6 seats
  • KORWiN (NI): 0 seats
  • Partia Razem (*): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by CBOS, 6–13 June 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions

  • Partia Razem (*): 0.1–0.8%
